name: Hawaiian Purple Kush
description: Hawaiian Purple Kush is an 80/20 indica-dominant strain that brings together the taste of the tropics and the potency of the Kush. Patients swear by this Hawaiian and Purple Kush cross for treatment of pain, insomnia, and muscle relaxation.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Giggly, Hungry, Sleepy, Stress, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Depression, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Anxious
